name: Not in use
description: Not in use

name: Chainmon Designer
description: Help us design a Chainmon. Send us ideas or sketches and work with our team to bring it to life! You also receive the very first one of its kind including all variations in your team! If you don't feel like designing then choose one of our upcoming in-house designs and claim it instead!

name: N-Corp Overseer
description: Become an N-Corp Overseer in the game and take over one of the 8 gyms. You can change their appearance and squad

name: Special Agent
description: You control a special agent NPC in the game which allows you to change their outfit, squad and name

name: Founder Token
description: This token grants the owner a permanent XP boost of 2.5% for both player level, season pass and Chainmons Only one founder token can be active per player It scales with every other XP modifier e.g. event-based XP boosts Places an emblem into your profile that proves to everyone that you are one of our first supporters; Not stackable

name: Mysterious Ticket
description: This ticket grants you access to a mysterious island where only you will be able to catch a super rare legendary Chainmon. This is a time-exclusive opportunity during Alpha/Beta with at least 12 months of exclusive access! This particular Chainmon can only be caught once per account.

name: Founder's Club Statue
description: Join the Founder's Club and become immortalized inside the N-Corp Headquarters in-game where all the players can see a statue of your character!

name: Crystal Skin
description: Temporarily apply a super exclusive Crystal Skin to ANY Chainmon! Total supply is strictly limited to 600 and you will never be able to obtain them again.

name: Exclusive Collector's Box
description: This Kickstarter exclusive Box is uniquely designed and can be used as a decorative object inside your in-game house.

name: Artbook "The Art of Chainmonsters"
description: The "Art of Chainmonsters" artbook can be used as a decorative object in your in-game house.

name: World Map Poster
description: A double-sided poster that can be put on the walls of your in-game house as a decoration.

name: Chipleaf Plushie
description: A cute Chipleaf plushie that you can put inside your in-game house for decoration.

name: Sticker Pack
description: Decorate your in-game house with some nice stickers and show everyone who a true fan is!

name: Kickstarter exclusive Outfit
description: An exclusive outfit for your character rewarded to those that participated in our Kickstarter campaign.

name: Alpha Access
description: Previously used to participate in our Alpha. Can be claimed for Closed Beta Access.

name: Kickstarter Badge
description: A honorary badge granted to those that supported us in our Kickstarter campaign. Created by claiming an Alpha Access NFT into a game account.

name: Mystery Berry
description: A mysterious berry. Some Chainmons go crazy for it!

name: Spectacular Pearl
description: An extremely shiny pearl that seems to inherit some special energy.

name: Helix Fossil
description: An old and mysterious fossil shaped like a Helix. Should be examined at a laboratory...

name: Sweet Pineapple
description: Pineapples are the best kind of apples.

name: Green Candy
description: A green candy that can be fed to Chainmons. Grants small experience boost on consumption.

name: Blue Candy
description: A blue candy that can be fed to Chainmons. Grants medium experience boost on consumption.

name: Purple Candy
description: A purple candy that can be fed to Chainmons. Grants large experience boost on consumption.

name: Muscle Band
description: When doing a normal attack, the damage is increased by 1% of the opponent's missing HP.

name: Hard Shell
description: Increases defense stat by 10%

name: Mint Token
description: An exclusive token that belongs to the Mint Club. Moustaaaaaache!

name: Energy Drink
description: Can it make you fly? Probably not. It does a pretty good job of keeping you awake though! Prevents the sleeping status effect.

name: Piece of Cake
description: Gain an EXP share from battles.

name: Essence of Electro
description: Electrostatic energy is flowing inside. Touching it creates a discharge effect.

name: Essence of Dendro
description: A beautiful flower is stored inside, emitting blossoms once a year.

name: Essence of Pyro
description: A wild flame is caught inside, blazing through the flask, emitting a natural heat.

name: Essence of Hydro
description: Gathered from the deepest point in the ocean, this special essence boasts of pure energy.

name: Essence of Anemo
description: Small clouds are surrounding this special essence from time to time.

name: Essence of Crystal
description: Shimmering light is reflected on the specular surface while small crystals have formed inside

name: Essence of Geo
description: Light is reflected from this rock-solid flask. Crafted by nature deep inside Ancora's crust.

name: Essence of Cryo
description: A deep frozen flask containing a surprising fluid, changing it's form from liquid to frozen every few seconds.

name: Master Charge
description: Guaranteed to replicate a wild Chainmon on first try!

name: Alpha Badge
description: A honorary badge granted to everyone who played our Alpha version.

name: Amber Chainmon
description: A mysterious Amber skin-variation of Svania. Only 1000 ever exist!

name: N-Corp Jacket
description: A stylish and super limited N-Corp jacket. Only worn by the best N-Corp agents out there!

name: Beanie
description: A stylish and super limited Beanie. Pro tip: Hides bad hair days!

name: Adventure Bundle
description: Get started on your adventure! Can be claimed for 10x Replicator charges, 10,000 Coins, 3x Green and 1x Blue Candy! (Non-NFTs!)

name: Purple Candy
description: A purple candy that can be fed to Chainmons. Grants large experience boost on consumption.

name: Pyro Gemstone Fragment
description: A shimmering red fragment of a Pyro Gemstone. A valuable upgrade for any Pyro Chainmon!

name: Dendro Gemstone Fragment
description: A shimmering green fragment of a Dendro Gemstone. A valuable upgrade for any Dendro Chainmon!

name: Closed Beta Access
description: This was used to access our previous Closed Beta phase 1 which is now completed.

name: ??? Key
description: A strange key. Who knows where this might belong to...

name: Worsteel Tee
description: Everyone loves Worsteel! Show your fandom with this stylish tshirt!

name: Master Charge
description: Guaranteed to replicate a wild Chainmon on first try!

name: Essence of Dendro
description: A beautiful flower is stored inside, emitting blossoms once a year.

name: Essence of Electro
description: Electrostatic energy is flowing inside. Touching it creates a discharge effect.

name: Essence of Pyro
description: A wild flame is caught inside, blazing through the flask, emitting a natural heat.

name: Essence of Hydro
description: Gathered from the deepest point in the ocean, this special essence boasts of pure energy.

name: Essence of Geo
description: Light is reflected from this rock-solid flask. Crafted by nature deep inside Ancora's crust.

name: Essence of Anemo
description: Small clouds are surrounding this special essence from time to time.

name: Mint Token
description: An exclusive token that belongs to the Mint Club. Moustaaaaaache!

name: Sunglasses
description: Everyone needs a pair of sunglasses when exploring Ancora!

name: Purple Candy
description: A purple candy that can be fed to Chainmons. Grants large experience boost on consumption.

name: Pose 'Gotcha'
description: An exclusive pose for your character that you can use as a taunt in battle!

name: Sugar Cubes
description: Some sugary cubes. When held in battle, your Chainmon restores a few HP after it survives an attack.

name: Pinecone
description: A rare cone from the mountain pine. Evolves a specific Chainmon when given to it.

name: Cookie
description: This cookie is so delicious it will instantly evolve a specific Chainmon when given to it.

name: Enhancer Silver
description: A shimmering silver piece used for crafting and upgrading Gear and other items.

name: Cute Bonsai
description: Is it a tree? Well, yes.. failry small one though. Makes a great decoration for your house.

name: Rare Foundation Pack
description: Includes 2 rare furniture items from the Chainmonsters Foundation Sale. Open on chainmonsters.com

name: Epic Foundation Pack
description: Includes 2 rare furniture items and 1 exclusive house from the Chainmonsters Foundation Sale. Open on chainmonsters.com

name: Legendary Foundation Pack
description: Includes 2 rare furniture items and 1 exclusive island from the Chainmonsters Foundation Sale. Open on chainmonsters.com

name: Aetherian Statue
description: This massive statue of a mysterious Chainmon called Aetherian is made out of a special material that glows day and night. The creator is unknown but it seems to come from ancient times...

name: Crystal Cache
description: A collection of emissive Crystals, collected from the depths of Ancora. Bursting with energy, yet to be discovered.

name: Hybrid Planter
description: A hybrid planter that inhibits a special plant. N-Corp is categorizing specimen from all over the world and puts them into those closed up systems.

name: Majestic Fountain
description: Owning your very exclusive fountain not only catches all the attention, it also serves as a nice access to fresh water for the creatures on Ancora.

name: Tree Lamp
description: Having a cozy, warm lamp inside a tree will make any visitors feel just at home!

name: Holo Projector
description: Place this Holographic projector anywhere and choose what to display! Any Chainmon can be turned into a hologram!

name: Metaverse Frame
description: A window into other worlds... Displays an NFT from your wallet directly in-game.

name: Nordic Island
description: An exclusive island based on a northern-European shore and coastline. Rough cliffs and windy weathers provide a unique view and environment.

name: Lakeside Island
description: An exclusive island based on a large lake and deep forest all around. Super cozy atmosphere all year around.

name: Tropical Island
description: An exclusive island based on a tropical island. Palms, beaches and warm weather define this unique look and atmosphere.

name: Modern Villa
description: An exclusive modern villa as your player house. This home has enough space for all of your furniture and cosmetics and features the highest possible space rank in-game.
